## IEppoClient interface

Client for assigning experiment variations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEppoClient 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getAssignment(subjectKey, experimentKey, subjectAttributes)](./js-client-sdk-common.ieppoclient.getassignment.md) | Maps a subject to a variation for a given experiment. |
|  [getAssignmentWithHooks(subjectKey, experimentKey, assignmentHooks, subjectAttributes)](./js-client-sdk-common.ieppoclient.getassignmentwithhooks.md) | Asynchronously maps a subject to a variation for a given experiment, with pre and post assignment hooks |
